trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Manteca
There were no other sightings in Manteca on or around November 18th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI was getting out of my car and had saw brightest blue light I've ever seen. Brighter then an Led light. It was size golf ball in the sky. It went to right and the hovered for br then went down, the went to the left, the shot tithe right so fast. I screamed for my husband then he finally came out and it was all way to the right. It the stopped and hovered , the went to right light turned off then went back on and was bright green. Then flashed in random beats and went super fast and we lost them and couldn't see trough the trees. Tried to drive and find it but couldn't
Summary: Ufo was blue southwest of self , shot north west then when it was center of me it shot south then back to center and straight up and down then shot north and hovered then lights turned off and there was no more visual.
